mapper.select:
select i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_postdate, i.item_image, j.item_file_name from item i left join (select item_no, min(item_file_name) as item_file_name from item_file group by item_no) j on i.item_no = j.item_no
and item_name like '%${searchWord1}%' and item_name like '%${searchWord2}%' and item_name like '%${searchWord3}%'
and (item_category = '${category}' or item_category = 0) and item_category = '${category}'
and item_detail = '${detail}' and floor(item_detail/100)*100 = '${detail}'
order by
item_name asc item_price asc item_postdate asc item_name desc item_price desc item_postdate desc
limit #{onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint};
